title: (x) Lenson sans serif corporate face - Neo Sans {Nick Cooke, Yves}
content:
Good morning,

does anyone know what sans serif is used in the sample below?  
Thanks in advance,

Seb

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110603061703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lenson_5844.png)
author: all about seb

comments.content: Hahaha, cross-posted with Nick! You get credited as you had the proper variation. The rounded "E" fooled me -- I couldn't remember if it was rounded in the Sans styles as well.
Thanks Yves & Nick for your speedy and precise response.
